trans-unit.source: Specifies when the system recycles the service object in the operation invocation process.
trans-unit.target: 指定系統在作業引動過程處理中回收服務物件的時間。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode> with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A> property to inform [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] that the current service object must be recycled at a particular point in the invocation process.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用具有 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode> 屬性的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.OperationBehaviorAttribute.ReleaseInstanceMode%2A>，來通知 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 目前服務物件必須在引動過程處理中的特定點回收。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior is to recycle a service object according to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 預設行為是根據 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A> 值來回收服務物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example code shows the use of <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode> to recycle service objects both before and after a call.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例程式碼示範如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ReleaseInstanceMode> 在呼叫前後回收服務物件。

trans-unit.source: Recycles the object subsequent to the completion of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 在完成作業之後回收物件。

trans-unit.source: Recycles the object prior to calling the operation and subsequent to the completion of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫作業之前以及完成作業之後回收物件。

trans-unit.source: Recycles the object prior to calling the operation.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫作業之前回收物件。

trans-unit.source: Recycles the object according to the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode" /> value.
